welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Plains, the charming and historic city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at Wilkes-Barre/Wyoming Valley Airport.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights at Wilkes-Barre/Wyoming Valley Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilkes-Barre/Scranton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wilkes-Barre/Scranton International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hazleton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Hazleton Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mt Pocono Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Mt Pocono Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
